item.title: Adding macros to Laravel Elonquent models
item.description: Maybe it's not the most elegant solution. Maybe even it isn't the right one. But I needed to explore this option, test it's viability and decide afterwards.

item.title: On the importance of knowing names... and Maximum Cardinality Matching in Bipartite Graphs
item.description: It happened to me recently. I was developing the backend for a web application, and this apparently easy and trivial problem resulted to be a complicated one. It was similar to other problems I've dealt with in the past - but the solution was not the same as the one in any of those.
